questionnaire.name: Transitions Integrations Framework (TIF) and Resources Reflection Questions
questionnaire.intro: Once you've complete the questionnaire continue on to Guide to ELA Classroom Activities that Promote Life Skills, College, and Career Readiness or click the link on the left side navigation.

survey.name: Transitions Integrations Framework (TIF) and Resources Reflection Questions
survey.title: Transitions Integrations Framework (TIF) and Resources Reflection Questions
survey.info:
When you have answered all the questions in the questionnaire, click submit > continue, so you may view your responses and print them. 

Once you have reviewed and printed your responses, continue on to Guide to ELA Classroom Activities that Promote Life Skills, College, and Career Readiness or click the link on the left side navigation.

question.name: Question 2
question.content: Choose three skills and subskills and review the sample activities to review. Notice that for each skill, three versions of an activity are offered to reflect an increasing level of complexity. Which level of complexity would be most appropriate for your students?

question.name: Question 3
question.content: Notice that each activity offers a suggestion for how it would be applied in three different contexts – community, school, work. What are some community, school, and work scenarios that would be relevant for your students?
